data.title: windows server 2003 R2 system backup image
data.meta_description: Hi, i have a workstation running on windows server 2003 R2 system, and I need to get a backup image from it, but I don't know how. could you please help with this issue?
data.text: clonezilla is free, or you could use acronis, but they need a license. If you can I recommand acronis as it can be installed inside Windows to make the image in a planned way. You could use veeam agent too, which is free for smaller business, ou would need to use a older version for 2003, but it's a tool that a lot of IT use, so it's easy to get help on. The choise is your :)
